message: Let's start fair.  I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. We can work out a better deal later if you're not happy with this.
Your offer was a bit too greedy for my liking, Alice.  Let's be realistic. This is a good deal for you before inflation eats away at your share.
Okay, Bob. I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 48/52. This is still a fair deal considering inflation is starting to kick in.
